# Interface ToolCallInterface

Represents a tool call made by the model.

interface ToolCallInterface {  
args: string;  
id: string;  
name: string;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

args id name

## Properties

### args

args: string

The arguments for the tool call. It is a JSON string.

### id

id: string

A unique identifier for the tool call.

### name

name: string

The name of the tool to be called.

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
